name: pnm_evs
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: PNM EVs: Generates physiological noise regressors for fMRI data

inputs.description: Input image filename (4D functional/EPI data)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Output filename (for confound/EV matrix)
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: TR of fMRI volumes (in seconds)
inputs.name: Repetition time

inputs.description: Input filename for cardiac values (1 or 2 columns: time [phase])
inputs.name: Cardiac values file

inputs.description: Input filename for respiratory phase values (1 or 2 columns: time [phase])
inputs.name: Respiratory values file

inputs.description: Order of basic cardiac regressors (number of Fourier pairs)
inputs.name: Order of cardiac regressors

inputs.description: Order of basic respiratory regressors (number of Fourier pairs)
inputs.name: Order of respiratory regressors

inputs.description: Order of multiplicative cardiac terms (also need to set --multr)
inputs.name: Order of multiplicative cardiac terms

inputs.description: Order of multiplicative respiratory terms (also need to set --multc)
inputs.name: Order of multiplicative respiratory terms

inputs.description: Filename of CSF mask image (and generate CSF regressor)
inputs.name: CSF mask image file

inputs.description: Input filename of RVT data (2 columns: time value)
inputs.name: RVT data file

inputs.description: Input filename for heart rate data (2 columns: time value)
inputs.name: Heart rate data file

inputs.description: Optional smoothing of RVT regressor (in seconds)
inputs.name: RVT smoothing

inputs.description: Optional smoothing of heart rate regressor (in seconds)
inputs.name: Heart rate smoothing

inputs.description: Specify slice direction (x/y/z)
inputs.name: Slice direction

inputs.description: Specify slice ordering (up/down/interleaved_up/interleaved_down)
inputs.name: Slice ordering

inputs.description: Specify slice timing via an external file
inputs.name: Slice timing file

inputs.description: Turn on debugging output
inputs.name: Debug flag

inputs.description: Switch on diagnostic messages
inputs.name: Verbose flag

inputs.description: Display help message
inputs.name: Help flag
